data.title: Samuel Elbert Barnett Obituary 2022
authors: Pace - Stancil Funeral Home and Cemetery

data.meta_site_name: Pace - Stancil Funeral Home and Cemetery
data.text: Samuel Elbert Barnett was born June 7, 1954 in Marianna, Arkansas to parents, Charles Chester Barnett and Sadie Mae Kindle Barnett. He passed away in Shepherd, Texas on December 22, 2022 at the age of 68. Samuel was an automotive mechanic and carpenter. He loved building trailers and was a real handyman. Samuel was preceded in death by his parents, Charles Chester Barnett and Sadie Mae Plymale; brothers, David Barnett, Gus Barnett, and Charlie Barnett. He is survived by his beloved wife of 49 years, Elizabeth Barnett; children, Loretta Sue Barnett, Ruth Ann Barnett, Nancy Ann Barnett, and Samuel Elbert Barnett Jr; sister, Ruby Mae Plymale; 11 grandchildren and 9 great grandchildren.
